channel.title: Scre4m
channel.description:
Watched this hilarious slasher last friday. If you've watcher scream before you'll know it's just the usual, if not, it's about a masked crazy person that stabs everyone until the end when we find out who it is...
If you want be scared shitless, this certainly isn't the film for you, the comical chase scenes and un-formidable deaths will make you laugh. You'll notice a couple of cliches dotted here and there however overall there are some good surprises along the way.
I recommend you watch it as a comedy, instead of a slasher!

item.title: Scre4m
item.dc:creator: @DEFET DEFET
item.description:
@DEFET wrote:

scary movies don’t exist anymore, only scary thoughts

these stuff would scary the fuck out of people 20+ years ago.

item.title: Scre4m
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Thought all of the Scream movies were terrible, so damn predictable. And no one can create a decent horror movie now, it’s unreal! Paranormal Activity 1-2 were terrible, terrible, terrible, as well the rest of them, I would love to see a decent horror movie for once.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Jrekko wrote:

I loved scream 4, not cause it was scary I just found it fun to watch.

Now, Insidious was a bad movie and so was paranormal activity 1 & 2 (2 was worse imo)

item.title: Scre4m
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

like 95% of the horror movies though all times have been terribad (perhaps a lower percentage during the late 70’s and 80’s). It’s always been a genre where a few movies keep the entire thing going thanks to fond memories.

This comes from a horror-fan by the way.

Read full topic

item.title: Scre4m
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:4, topic:391748”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=488912.msg3574228#msg3574228 date=1303292616]
Such a shit movie
[/quote]This, but most modern horror films aren’t even scary regardless of how hard they try.

Only “scary movie” that has ever scared me was Paranormal Activity 1-2. TOO REAL SON, TOO REAL.[/quote][quote=“Frell, post:5, topic:391748”]Blair witch project and Paranormal activity, hills have eyes, is pretty much it.[/quote]

You’ve got to be kidding me? Paranormal activity came to the UK uberly hyped up, it was the most boring, uninteresting film I have ever seen.

Read full topic
